title: pgeuder: Minecraft PS3版售量在PlayStation Store排名靠前！
author: 修改器很好玩
txt_content:
本帖最后由 修改器很好玩 于 2015-1-17 09:10 编辑 
Playstation US Store's top sellers 2014: http://blog.us.playstation.com/2 ... op-sellers-of-2014/ … Minecraft was doing quite well at positions #1 #2 #4
pgeuder: PlayStation US Store 销售排名：http://blog.us.playstation.com/2015/01/16/playstation-store-the-top-sellers-of-2014/。Minecraft排名极为靠前！
